dict.acceptation: 发展，进化；被发展的状态；新生事物，新产品；开发区；

sent.orig: Sustainable development includes at least four aspects: perpetual development, all-round development, common development and orderly development.
sent.trans: 可持续发展至少包含了永久发展、全面发展、共同发展和梯级发展四个层面的内涵。

sent.orig: Development view is the world outlook of method of mode of answer development purpose, development, development.
sent.trans: 发展观是回答发展目的、发展模式、发展手段的世界观。

sent.orig: The striding development is a development train of thought or development strategy compared to gradual development.
sent.trans: 跨越式发展是相对渐进式发展而言的一种发展思路或发展战略。

sent.orig: In the course of development, gradually expand their own and development capabilities and and development institutions.
sent.trans: 公司在发展过程中，逐步壮大自身的研发能力和研发机构。

sent.orig: Bank development new product has independent development and joint development normally two kinds of forms.
sent.trans: 银行开发新产品通常有独立开发和合作开发两种形式。
